column9: I use this for my severe migraines when I can not keep a zofran tablet down.  Makes me drowsy but sleep is good when you feel so horrible.

column2: 3-6 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: I used this medicine on my 2 1/2 year old daughter when she had gastroenteritis. It works great the only downfall was it started to immediately melt when I went to insert it. The medicine did make her sleepy but that was good so that she can rest.

column9: I have been sick with the stomache flu and cant really keep anything down. So far its working good but its a little uncomfortable for the first hour, lol.

column2: smesser, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This is awesome.  Makes you sleepy, but enables you to get any other meds and/or fluids to help with dehydration.

column2: aangel414, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I used this medication when I came down with a bad Stomach Virus... It worked really well with the vomiting, however I slept alot!! It was even difficult for me to get up and moving the next day!

column2: courtney102172, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was using this medication for nausea and vomiting. It worked great. Before my own salavia made me want to vomit but after taking this I was able to take a so much very needed pain medication. The only downfall was I could not take this medication during the work day due to drownsiness. I could not take this medication at home during the night.

column2: Mleigh81107, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I used the medication and it worked really good the only thing is I got really tired...but with me feeling so sick I enjoying getting some rest.

column2: Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Caregiver)
column9: I used thid suppository on my child when she was vomiting.  She still vomited but was sleepy enough that she rested between.  I was afraid of leaving her while on this so I stayed in her room the entire time, even thru the night.  Due to her age (5) it was easy to insert, easier that convincing her to drink something.

I used this drug at about 8:00pm to combat feelings of nausea.  It helped with the nausea and I was actually able to eat again for the first time in 3 days.  However, I had really bad gas and terrible stomach cramps during the night.  Overall I was satisfied that the nausea was gone, but I still had to take some pepto in the middle of the night do to the cramps.

column2: Nurse81, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: This drug was a bit difficult to use on my 6 year old and really didn't help a whole lot.
